mapper.select: select count(*) from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where date between #{date1} and #{date2}

select * from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where id = #{id1}

select min(bias5) from anyquant.quotadata_${siid} where date between #{date1} and #{date2}
